verblex: 1. To have a good look at something in order to get more information about it. English = examine.
interj: 1. Used alone in response to your addressee's insistence that something is true or will happen to mean you do not agree but don't want to argue the point any further. English = 'We'll see.', 'That remains to be seen.', 'Let's wait and see, shall we?' etc
partlex: 1. Used to introduce a suggestion or idea. English = 'Let's see. How about...'.
